To the called of God who believes in the light of the Lambe to be read in their assemblyes in the pure dread of the Lord. Fox, George, d. 1661.
4 p.
Printed for Thomas Simmons ..., London : 1660.
Caption title. Signed at end: G. Fox. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
